name: Psychological Flourishing (Diener-8)
description: Measures meaning, relationships, engagement, optimism, and purpose.
title: Flourishing
instructions: Below are 8 statements with which you may agree or disagree. Using the 1-7 scale below, indicate your agreement with each item by indicating that response for each statement.

questions.text: I am competent and capable in the activities that are important to me.
I am a good person and live a good life.
I am optimistic about my future.
I lead a purposeful and meaningful life.
My social relationships are supportive and rewarding.
I am engaged and interested in my daily activities.
I actively contribute to the happiness and well-being of others.
